## About me
I'm a PhD Student in the [Department of Biomedical Informatics](https://www.dbmi.columbia.edu) adviced by [George Hripcsak](https://www.dbmi.columbia.edu/profil/george-hripcsak/). My research concerns using observational data for generating real-world evidence, from observational study design and ontology engineering all the way to delivering evidence to clinicians.

Before my PhD I graduated from Kharkiv Medical University magna cum laude and completed my residency in internal medicine. Actve OHDSI collaborator.


## Updates

Discussing standardized processes for phenotype development and evaluation at the [OHDSI 2020 Symposium](https://www.ohdsi.org/2020-ohdsi-global-symposium/).
